The one-time event Illithid Invasion is active across all servers! See here for more!

Category:Neck items

Clothing Jewelry

Helms
Gloves
Cloaks
Belts
Boots
Bracers
Goggles
Necklaces
Rings
Trinkets

Necklaces, amulets, pendants etc.

Many amulets and necklaces can take the neck slot. They can be enchanted randomly with one of the Clothing enhancements or be one of the named drops found below.


Item Special Abilities ML Bind Quest Chest
Shimmering Pendant
  • Charisma +3 Charisma +3: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +3 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
  • Diplomacy +6Diplomacy +6: Passive: +6 Competence bonus to the Diplomacy skill.
  • Bluff +6Bluff +6: Passive: +6 Competence bonus to the Bluff skill.
 4 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Partycrashers Private Rooms chest, End chest
Venn's Necklace
  • Wizardry IWizardry I: This item grants the wearer +25 maximum spell points. Sorcerers and Favored Souls gain up to double spell points from items.
  • Colorless Augment Slot: EmptyColorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 3 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Lost Seekers
Amulet of Natural Armor
  • Natural Armor +1Natural Armor +1: Passive: +1 Natural Armor Bonus to Armor Class.

Shrunken Head
  • Resistance +3 Resistance +3: Passive: +3 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9

    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14

    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

Azure Necklace of Prophecy
  • Lightning Lore +11%Lightning Lore +11: Passive: Your Electricity spells gain a 11% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Magnetism +73Magnetism +73: Passive: +73 Equipment bonus to Electricity Spell Power.
  • Electric Resistance +20Electric Resistance +20: Passive: +20 Enhancement bonus to your Electric Resistance.
  • Electric Absorption +19% Electric Absorption +19%: Passive: 19% Enhancement Bonus to Electric Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Draconic ProphecyDraconic Prophecy: 2 Pieces Equipped:
    +5 Artifact bonus to Universal Spellpower
    +10 Artifact bonus to Magical Resistance Rating Cap

Torc of Prince Raiyum-de II
  • Transform Kinetic EnergyTransform Kinetic Energy: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that the energy of the blow will be converted into Spell Points.
  • Enchantment Focus +3 Enchantment Focus +3: +3 Equipment bonus to the DC of Enchantment spells.
  • Spell Penetration +4 Spell Penetration +4: Passive: +4 Equipment bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
  • Wizardry +121 Wizardry +121: +121 Enhancement bonus to spell points.
  • The Desert's Biting SandsThe Desert's Biting Sands: 2 Pieces Equipped:

  • Natural Armor +3Natural Armor +3: Passive: +3 Natural Armor Bonus to Armor Class.

Lorrik's Necklace
  • Wisdom +6 Wisdom +6: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
  • Wizardry VIWizardry VI: This item grants the wearer +150 maximum spell points. Sorcerers and Favored Souls gain up to double spell points from items.
  • Efficient Metamagic - Empower Healing IIEfficient Metamagic - Empower Healing II: The additional spell point cost for using the Empower Healing Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP.
  • Lorikk's ChampionLorikk's Champion: With 2 items equipped - Provides a +72 Equipment bonus to healing spell power. With 3 items equipped - Provides a +78 Equipment bonus to healing spell power.

  • Chain LightningChain Lightning
    Caster level: 12
    Charges: 3 (3/day)     — 3 Charges (Recharged/Day:3)
  • Electric Resistance +30Electric Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Electric Resistance.
  • Protection +4Protection +4: Passive: +4 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Upgradeable Item (Stormreaver)Upgradeable Item (Stormreaver): This item could be upgraded if you found a Seal of the Stormreaver to combine it with. Bring this item to the Stormreaver Monument in Gianthold and combine it with a Seal of the Stormreaver to upgrade the item to a more powerful form.

  • Lesser MaximizeLesser Maximize
    Caster level: 12
    Charges: 3 (3/day)     — 3 Charges (Recharged/Day:3)
  • Combustion +78Combustion +78: Passive: +78 Equipment bonus to Fire Spell Power.
  • Efficient Metamagic - Enlarge IEfficient Metamagic - Enlarge I: The additional spell point cost for using the Enlarge Metamagic feat is reduced by 1 SP.
  • Spell Lore IIISpell Lore III: Passive: All of your spells gain a 3% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Upgradeable Item (Black Abbot)Upgradeable Item (Black Abbot): This item could be upgraded if you found a Seal of the Black Abbot to combine it with. Bring this item to the Fountain of Necrotic Might outside the Black Mausoleum and combine it with a Seal of the Black Abbot to upgrade the item to a more powerful form.

Epic Adherent's Pendant
  • Required Class: Paladin (UMD: 16)
  • Healing Lore +16%Healing Lore +16: Passive: Your Positive Energy spells gain a 16% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Devotion +111Devotion +111: Passive: +111 Equipment bonus to Positive (Healing) Spell Power.
  • Wizardry +195 Wizardry +195: +195 Enhancement bonus to spell points.
  • Action Boost EnhancementAction Boost Enhancement: This will increase the total number of Action Boosts you can use by 3. However, these additional Action Boosts will only take effect after the wielder rests.
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45

    • Named: Category:Green augments

    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)

    • Fortification: +25% to +100%

    • Hit points: +4 to +54

Epic Vulkoorim Pendant
  • Healing Lore +16%Healing Lore +16: Passive: Your Positive Energy spells gain a 16% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Void Lore +16%Void Lore +16: Passive: Your Negative Energy and Poison spells gain a 16% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.

  • Proof Against Poison +8 Proof Against Poison +8: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +8 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 9 + their Fortitude save).

Alchemist's Pendant
  • Constitution +6 Constitution +6: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • Alchemical ConservationAlchemical Conservation: This item modifies the user's energy expenditure in such a way that many abilities can be used more frequently than normal. You will gain +1 ki on every successful attack, and you will increase the number of Action Boosts, Turn Undead attempts, and Bard Songs you can use per rest by 1 each.
    These additional uses will only take effect after you rest.
  • Greater Elemental EnergyGreater Elemental Energy: Harnessing a small amount of power and potential of the raw elements, this item gives you a +20 bonus to your maximum hit points. This stacks with all bonuses except for Greater Elemental Energy.
  • Nearly FinishedNearly Finished: This item isn't quite finished, but it's only a step away from completion. Bring it to a Cannith Reforging Station and combine it with melted materials to restore this item to its full potential. (unlock additional powers)

  • Bluff +16Bluff +16: Passive: +16 Competence bonus to the Bluff skill.
  • Improved Deception Improved Deception: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a +5 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, while using this item your weapons have a chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.

  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

Periapt of Health
  • Proof Against Disease +6 Proof Against Disease +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).
 None UnboundUnbound: This item is Unbound, and may take permanent damage. Random level ~2 chests/rewards
Necklace of Mystic Eidolons
  • Eidolon SummonsEidolon Summons: On Being Damaged: Animates a portion of the wearer's shadow to support them in battle. The shadow remains animate for 30 seconds and can be created once every 120 seconds.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • DeathblockDeathblock: The wearer of this item is immune to all death spells and magical death effects.
  • Insightful Constitution +3Insightful Constitution +3: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +3 insight bonus to Constitution.
  • Insightful Dexterity +3Insightful Dexterity +3: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +3 insight bonus to Dexterity.

    • Named: Category:Green augments

    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)

    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16

    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57

 26 Bound to Character on EquipBound to Character on Equip: This item is Bound to Character on Equip The Haunted Halls of Eveningstar Miior or Dragon chest
Dark Diversion
  • OccultationOccultation: 20% Enhancement bonus to Decreased threat generated from all damage.
  • Assassinate +15 Assassinate +15: +15 Enhancement bonus to the DC of character's Assassinate attempts.
  • Hide +20Hide +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Hide skill.
  • Move Silently +20Move Silently +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Move Silently skill.
  • Colorless Augment Slot: EmptyColorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 26 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Temple of the Deathwyrm Raid chest
Stolen Necklace (Level 15)
  • Charisma +6 Charisma +6: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
  • One of the following:
    • Accuracy V Accuracy V: Passive: +5 Competence bonus to attack rolls
    • Natural Armor +5Natural Armor +5: Passive: +5 Natural Armor Bonus to Armor Class.
    • Resistance +5 Resistance +5: Passive: +5 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
    • Wizardry VWizardry V: This item grants the wearer +125 maximum spell points. Sorcerers and Favored Souls gain up to double spell points from items.
    • Bluff +11Bluff +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Bluff skill.
    • Concentration +11Concentration +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Concentration skill.
    • Diplomacy +11Diplomacy +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Diplomacy skill.
    • Haggle +11Haggle +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Haggle skill.
    • Heal +11Heal +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Heal skill.
    • Intimidate +11Intimidate +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Intimidate skill.
    • Listen +11Listen +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Listen skill.
    • Search +11Search +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Search skill.
    • Spellcraft +11Spellcraft +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Spellcraft skill.
    • Spot +11Spot +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Spot skill.
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9

    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

Periapt of Wisdom
  • Wisdom +2 Wisdom +2: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +2 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.

Elegant Diamond Necklace
  • Negative Energy Absorption - 3 Charges (Recharged/Day: 1)Negative Energy Absorption: This effect absorbs negative energy and energy drain effects.
 None Bound to Character on EquipBound to Character on Equip: This item is Bound to Character on Equip DDO Store Healing & Magic
Epic Locus of Vol
  • Taint of EvilTaint of Evil: Good aligned characters equipping this item suffer a temporary negative level until the item is removed.
  • FearsomeFearsome: This item causes those who strike the user to be overcome with terror, as from the Fear spell.
  • Blood RageBlood Rage: Anytime you are hit there is a chance that you will fall into a Blood Rage. Blood Rage gives up to a +8 bonus to Strength and Constitution but will also cause short periods of lethargy when your lust for blood becomes sated.
  • ManslayerManslayer: While wearing this item, your weapon attacks gain the devastating ability to defeat a humanoid opponent with a single decisive blow. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit a humanoid target will be killed. Powerful humanoids may resist the vorpal strike and instead take 100 points of damage until they have been sufficiently weakened.
  • Vitality +40Vitality +40: Passive: +40 Vitality bonus to Hit Points.
  • Intimidate +20Intimidate +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Intimidate skill.
  • Upgradeable - Primary AugmentUpgradeable - Primary Augment: This item can be upgraded to contain a Yellow, Blue or Red (weapons and shields only) augment. Bring this item to the Fountain of Necrotic Might outside the Black Mausoleum and combine it with Item:Epic Tapestry Shreds to upgrade the item. (Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments

    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10

 27 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Desecrated Temple of Vol (epic) End chest
Shroud of Ardent
  • Smoke ScreenSmoke Screen: You are surrounded by wisps of concealing smoke, giving opponents a 20% concealment chance to miss you.
  • Immunity to FearImmunity to Fear: The wearer of this item is immune to all fear effects.
  • Competence Healing Amplification +53Healing Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming positive energy healing by +53 (Competence bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Sheltering +33 Sheltering +33: +33 Enhancement bonus to Physical and Magical Resistance Ratings
  • Armor Bonus +13Armor Bonus +13: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +13 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Upgradeable - Primary AugmentUpgradeable - Primary Augment: This item can be upgraded to contain a Yellow, Blue or Red (weapons and shields only) augment. Epic Noxious Embers
  • Lesser MaximizeLesser Maximize
    Caster level: 12
    Charges: 5 (5/day)     — 5 Charges (Recharged/Day:5)
  • Efficient Metamagic - Enlarge IIEfficient Metamagic - Enlarge II: The additional spell point cost for using the Enlarge Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP.
  • Combustion +142Combustion +142: Passive: +142 Equipment bonus to Fire Spell Power.
  • Spell Lore +12Spell Lore 12: Passive: All of your spells gain a 12% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Upgradeable - Primary AugmentUpgradeable - Primary Augment: This item can be upgraded to contain a Yellow, Blue or Red (weapons and shields only) augment.     • Spell penetration: +1 to +9

Legendary Dawn's Herald-Charm
  • Wisdom +13 Wisdom +13: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +13 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
  • Insightful FaithInsightful Faith: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Insightful Faith items provide Insight Bonuses to the owner's effective level for the turning check by +2, their maximum Hit Dice turned by +2, and their total Hit Dice turned by +4.
  • SacredSacred: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Sacred items provide an +2 Enhancement bonus to your effective level for Turning Undead.

Dawn's Herald-Charm
  • Wisdom +6 Wisdom +6: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
  • Insightful FaithInsightful Faith: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Insightful Faith items provide Insight Bonuses to the owner's effective level for the turning check by +2, their maximum Hit Dice turned by +2, and their total Hit Dice turned by +4.
  • SacredSacred: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Sacred items provide an +2 Enhancement bonus to your effective level for Turning Undead.
  • Hallowed +2Hallowed: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Hallowed items provide an +2 Enhancement bonus to the maximum Hit Dice of undead turned.

  • True SeeingTrue Seeing: Passive: You gain the benefit of the spell True Seeing.
  • Armor-Piercing - 20% Armor-Piercing - 20%: Passive: +20% Enhancement bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Deadly +10 Deadly +10: +10 Competence bonus to weapon damage.
  • Relentless FuryRelentless Fury: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enchantment damage bonus to your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.

Key of Rhukaan Draal
  • Intelligence +14 Intelligence +14: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +14 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
  • Insightful Accuracy +10Insightful Accuracy +10: Passive: +10 Insight bonus to attack rolls
  • Insightful Deadly +5Insightful Deadly +5: +5 Insight bonus to weapon damage.
  • Chaos Absorption +23% Chaos Absorption +23%: Passive: 23% Enhancement Bonus to Chaos Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54

Cracked Core
  • Insightful Constitution +6Insightful Constitution +6: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +6 insight bonus to Constitution.
  • Quality Constitution +3Quality Constitution +3: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +3 quality bonus to Constitution.
  • SoundproofSoundproof: Protects against stunning, dazing and disorientation from sound-based spells such as Soundburst and Greater Shout.
  • Alchemical ConservationAlchemical Conservation: This item modifies the user's energy expenditure in such a way that many abilities can be used more frequently than normal. You will gain +1 ki on every successful attack, and you will increase the number of Action Boosts, Turn Undead attempts, and Bard Songs you can use per rest by 1 each.
    These additional uses will only take effect after you rest.

Wearing multiple items that bear the Legendary Taint of Shavarath creates dangerous imbalances of energy as the items feed more and more upon the wielder. Perhaps there is a way to appease this item...

Periapt of Proof Against Poison
  • Proof Against Poison +6 Proof Against Poison +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).

Dream Collar
  • Chaos Absorption +15% Chaos Absorption +15%: Passive: 15% Enhancement Bonus to Chaos Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • True SeeingTrue Seeing: Passive: You gain the benefit of the spell True Seeing.
  • Armor Bonus +6Armor Bonus +6: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +6 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Shield +6Shield +6: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +6 Shield bonus to Armor Class. It does not stack with an equipped shield.

Epic Lizardfolk Tooth Necklace
  • Strength +9 Strength +9: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +9 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Shatter +11Shatter +11: This effect gives a +11 enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Sunder and Improved Sunder attempts.
  • Melee Alacrity 15%Melee Alacrity 15%: Gain 15% enhancement bonus to Melee attack speed. Does not stack with the Haste spell.
  • Insightful Seeker +4Insightful Seeker +4: Provides a +4 Insight bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +4 Insight bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).
  • Relentless FuryRelentless Fury: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enchantment damage bonus to your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.

Perfected Golden Guile
  • Enhanced GhostlyEnhanced Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 15% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • Dexterity +14 Dexterity +14: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +14 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
  • Improved Deception +21Improved Deception: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a +21 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, while using this item your weapons have a chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.
  • Exceptional Nimble Skills Bonus +10Exceptional Nimble Skills Bonus: +10 Exceptional bonus to Balance, Hide, Move Silently, Open Lock and Tumble.
  • Exceptional Alluring Skills Bonus +10Exceptional Alluring Skills Bonus: +10 Exceptional bonus to Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle, Intimidate, and Perform.
  • Psychic WardPsychic Ward: This items wards you against mind-altering effects and spells, such as Charm and Domination.

Legendary Azure Necklace of Prophecy
  • Lightning Lore +22%Lightning Lore +22: Passive: Your Electricity spells gain a 22% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Magnetism +151Magnetism +151: Passive: +151 Equipment bonus to Electricity Spell Power.
  • Electric Absorption +36% Electric Absorption +36%: Passive: 36% Enhancement Bonus to Electric Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Electric Resistance +54Electric Resistance +54: Passive: +54 Enhancement bonus to your Electric Resistance.

Legendary Golden Guile
  • Enhanced GhostlyEnhanced Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 15% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • Bluff +20Bluff +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Bluff skill.
  • Diplomacy +20Diplomacy +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Diplomacy skill.
  • Improved Deception +20Improved Deception: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a +20 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, while using this item your weapons have a chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.
  • Exceptional Alluring Skills Bonus +10Exceptional Alluring Skills Bonus: +10 Exceptional bonus to Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle, Intimidate, and Perform.
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45

    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10

Legendary Necklace of Venom
  • Proof Against Poison +11 Proof Against Poison +11: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +11 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 12 + their Fortitude save).

  • Proof Against Disease +11 Proof Against Disease +11: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +11 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 12 + their Fortitude save).

Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.

Legendary Raptor Teeth Necklace
  • Enhanced BloodrageEnhanced Bloodrage: This weapon is enhanced by blood - your blood! Each time you take damage or kill an enemy, there is a small chance that you will fall into an unholy bloodrage, greatly increasing your Melee Power, Constitution, and Damage. However, this rage will leave you more vulnerable to Physical attacks, slightly reducing your Armor Class.

Perfected Vulkoorim Pendant
  • Vulkoor's BiteVulkoor's Bite: Vulkoor calls to you, and death answers. Attacks and offensive spells have a chance to deal 1d3 Negative levels.
  • Dark Restoration Lore +23%Dark Restoration Lore +23: Passive: Your Negative, Poison and Positive spells gain a 23% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Power of the Dark Restoration +157Power of the Dark Restoration +157: Passive: +157 Equipment bonus to Negative, Poison and Positive Spell Power.
  • Competence Healing Amplification +59Healing Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming positive energy healing by +59 (Competence bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Profane Negative Amplification +59Negative Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming negative energy healing by +59 (Profane bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Taint of EvilTaint of Evil: Good aligned characters equipping this item suffer a temporary negative level until the item is removed.

Legendary Pendant of Subtle Pain
  • Quality Accuracy +5Quality Accuracy +5: Passive: +5 Quality bonus to attack rolls
  • Improved Deception +21Improved Deception: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a +21 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, while using this item your weapons have a chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.

  • Distant Diversion +21% Distant Diversion +21%: +21% Enhancement bonus to decreased threat generated from ranged damage.
  • Mystic Diversion +21% Mystic Diversion +21%: +21% Enhancement bonus to decreased threat generated from spell damage.
  • Armor-Piercing - 21% Armor-Piercing - 21%: Passive: +21% Enhancement bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)

    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Legendary Forbidden KnowledgeLegendary Forbidden Knowledge: 3 Pieces Equipped:
    +30 Profane bonus to PRR
    4 Pieces Equipped:
    +3 Profane bonus to all ability scores
    +4 Profane bonus to attack and damage
    5 Pieces Equipped:
    +15 Profane bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
    +25 Profane bonus to Universal Spell Power
    +3 Profane bonus to Spell DCs
 32 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Fire Over Morgrave end chest
